title: how hard it is to focus an adc?
body: I just lost a game because our assassin wouldnt group and blow up the enemy adc, would join fights late and just sorta clean up. how hard is it to focus something as zed?{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Meh, ADCs rarely even have any presence in the game as it currently is.

The assassin should be focusing more on the Mid Laner or perhaps the support depending on what champion they are.
A zed takes over the game by becoming an unstoppable split pusher where you have to send at least 2 people to deal with creating a 4v3 elsewhere
Vayne is the hardest one to focus, due to being invisible half the time and doing roly-polies all over the place. But as Zed? Theres no excuse for anything not going to plan on Zed, he is fucked.

Depends on the assassin, someone like Kat cleans up, but assuming you're not talking about her, it depends more or less on the actual team comps

I remember when I used to play Kassadin it was incredibly easy to get to the enemy ADC due to my specific build to blow them up but eh I dunno
not hard. Zed right now to me is over powered since the changed to qss. Its really easy taking a adc down late game with flash ulti and a combo or so.
